document.title: Appendix B: Roster of Deans and Faculty
document.abstract: This listing of ILR Deans and faculty has been compiled from a combination of human resource records kept at the school since 1946, ILR deansâ€™ reports, and other university sources.
document.publication-title: The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni and Friends

field.name: comments
